document_data.name: ''Ring of Spell Power''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''ring of spell power''''' was an [[enchanted]] [[ring]] worn by [[wizard]]s. It could be found in [[Waterdeep]] as of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: The wearer could activate a ''ring of spell power'' to increase the destructive power of their [[spell]]s and other [[magical]] attacks.
document_data.Notable Owners: * [[Shevarith Kendia]], a [[rashemi]] wizard who worked as an [[adventurer]] on behalf of [[Laeral Silverhand]], the [[Open Lord]] of Waterdeep, during the late 15{{th}} century DR.
